code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{flatDeep,slugify,containsObject}from'../../../utils';import PostData from'../../../data/blog/PostData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TagOne=function TagOne(props){var tagItems=PostData.map(function(item){return item.tags;});var singleCatArray=flatDeep(tagItems);var tags=[];singleCatArray.forEach(function(cat){var obj={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:1};var objIndex=containsObject(obj,tags);if(objIndex!==-1){var prevCount=tags[objIndex].count;tags[objIndex]={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:prevCount+1};}else{tags.push(obj);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"edu-blog-widget".concat(props.style2==='enable'?'-2':''," widget-tags ").concat(props.extraClass||''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"widget-title",children:"Popular Tags"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tag-list".concat(props.style2==='enable'?' bg-shade':''),children:tags.map(function(tag){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/tag/".concat(tag.slug),children:tag.title},tag.slug);})})})]})});};export default TagOne;
